definition: Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Bassanio tried to keep Antonio from accepting these terms.
sentences.chinese: 巴萨尼奥设法阻止安东尼奥接受条件。

sentences.english: Monsters were not responding to damage taken from the skill Balthazar's Aura.
sentences.chinese: 修正怪物对巴萨则灵气所造成的伤害没有回应。

sentences.english: That's what we'll be thinking about when we go to Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 这就是当我们去巴萨罗那的时候所思考的。

sentences.english: The survey said the average annual first-team wage at Barcelona was ￡4.94m.
sentences.chinese: 巴萨先发阵容球员平均年薪为494万英镑。

sentences.english: You see me, Lord Bassanio, where I stand.
sentences.chinese: 巴萨尼奥阁下，你瞧我站在这。

sentences.english: Hope you can also lead Bassa to obtain the excellent achievement next year.
sentences.chinese: 希望明年您还可以带领巴萨取得优异的成绩。

sentences.english: The Barca B team is fourth in the second division in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 巴萨B队目前在西班牙乙级联赛里排第四。

sentences.english: Will Manchester United and FC Barcelona Continue to Fall?
sentences.chinese: 曼联和巴萨将盛极而衰？

sentences.english: Barça have won 28 out of their 30 opening day games at home.
sentences.chinese: 首个比赛日在主场的30场比赛，巴萨赢了28场。

sentences.english: Miguel can be signed for nothing and has also been linked with Manchester United and Barcelona this summer.
sentences.chinese: 同时，曼联和巴萨罗那也想免费得到米盖尔。

sentences.english: His role at Barcelona involved working with both the youth set-up and the Barca B team.
sentences.chinese: 他在巴萨时期扮演着同样的角色包括青年队和B队。

sentences.english: They are very quick and dangerous on the counterattack and we paid for that.
sentences.chinese: 反击中的巴萨非常快速危险，我们为此付出了代价。

sentences.english: Barcelona are becoming obsessed with and terrified by Madrid and Mourinho.
sentences.chinese: 巴萨被皇马和穆里尼奥盯得心里发毛。

sentences.english: When we were on holiday in Spain, he only liked Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 每当我们去西班牙度假时，他都只喜欢巴萨罗那。

sentences.english: Bassanio and Portia arranged to get married.
sentences.chinese: 巴萨尼奥和鲍西娅准备要结婚。

sentences.english: However, no matter what just like Barca, the Champions League eluded them.
sentences.chinese: 然而，就像巴萨，球队在欧洲冠军杯上总是折戟沉沙。

definition: Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system
Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
La Coruña or A Coruña (city in Galicia, Spain)
